name: Whaly
headline: Whaly is building a self-service analytics platform
description:
Whaly helps data teams save time on maintenance and analysis building while making business users more autonomous on the analysis they want to improve their decision making.

We do this by providing a self service data platform where both data and business teams can work together.

We understood that most data teams were ending up being a bottleneck for the rest of the company and needed to give more autonomy to business teams to back their decisions with data.

Emilien, Florian and Pierre were the minds behind the Data advertising platforms of the major media and e-commerce companies in France in their earlier position as Product Manager and head of Customer Success, giving them an edge on how to execute successfully a data project.

founders.name: Emilien Sanchez, Founder
founders.description: As a former product manager I love building products that are heavily used by customers, I also enjoy doing sales and understanding pains and drivers.

founders.name: Florian Buguet, Founder
founders.description:
COO & Co-Founder @Whaly
Head of CS @mediarithmics
Previously consulting @Accenture & Deloitte

founders.name: Pierre de Poulpiquet, Founder
founders.description:
Engineer from Paris, France üá´üá∑üêì

Loves to hack around üë®‚Äçüíª, eat baguette ü•ñ and learn new things üß†!

After initial experience in Business Consulting üëî at large firms and product manager ü¶Ñ at a Data marketing startup, I'm building Whaly üê≥ with my 2 co-founders!

I often have strong opinions/learnings about the stuff that interest me so, keep me posted to see if I can help you with something üòâ

# Smart Decisions, Smarter Operations, Powered by AI
Future-proof your operations and drive growth through AI-powered data solutions, tailored to your industry.
[Request a demo](https://whaly.io/</form/contact-sales>)
Backed by ![YCombinator](https://whaly.io/icons/yc.svg)
![No code business intelligence](https://whaly.io/platform/main.png)
## Trusted by data-driven companies
![clone](https://whaly.io/customers/clone.svg)
![inmemori](https://whaly.io/customers/inmemori.svg)
![alegria](https://whaly.io/customers/alegria.svg)
![ignition-program](https://whaly.io/customers/ignition-program.svg)
![lokki](https://whaly.io/customers/lokki.png)
![crushon](https://whaly.io/customers/crushon.svg)
![mercateam](https://whaly.io/customers/mercateam.svg)
![polar-analytics](https://whaly.io/customers/polar-analytics.svg)

![moneytizer](https://whaly.io/customers/moneytizer.png)
![kaliz](https://whaly.io/customers/kaliz.png)
![julaya](https://whaly.io/customers/julaya.png)

![beanstock](https://whaly.io/customers/beanstock.png)

![tudigo](https://whaly.io/customers/tudigo.png)

![fabriq](https://whaly.io/customers/fabriq.png)
## Don't take our word for granted
![users love us](https://whaly.io/badges/users-love-us.png)
![high performer spring](https://whaly.io/badges/HighPerformer_Spring.png)
![high performer summer](https://whaly.io/badges/HighPerformer_Summer.png)
![01](https://whaly.io/icons/01.svg)
Where data meets direction
Whaly is an AI platform that aggregates and makes sense of your data for you. We handle the entire process from data ingestion to the delivery of real-time actionable insights and alerts, helping you steer your strategic efforts in the right direction.
Our powerful platform empowers you to quickly understand what to prioritize, and consistently make smarter decisions that lead to impactful business outcomes. 
![](https://whaly.io/icons/check-rounded.svg)Maximize the value of your dispersed data
![](https://whaly.io/icons/check-rounded.svg) Don‚Äôt just react, proactively strategize and chart the right course
![](https://whaly.io/icons/check-rounded.svg) Drive operational efficiencies with ease
![](https://whaly.io/icons/check-rounded.svg) Ignite unprecedented revenue growth
[Request a demo](https://whaly.io/</form/contact-sales>)
![02](https://whaly.io/icons/02.svg)
Tailored to your every need
Every decision is a catalyst for success, and we‚Äôre here to help you make the right call, consistently and confidently. We offer various AI solutions that are tailored to different roles and industries. 
[![/icons/performance.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/performance.svg)Sales performanceMonitor sales performance in real-time, and proactively act on the most promising prospects and accounts when it matters.](https://whaly.io/</use-cases/sales-performance>)
[![/icons/mission.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/mission.svg)Retail execution monitoringEmpower your field sales teams to prioritize the right actions and stores, freeing up their time to focus on value-added tasks.](https://whaly.io/</use-cases/retail-execution>)
[![/icons/features.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/features.svg)Perfect store monitoringGet real-time alerts for optimizing how your products are displayed and merchandised in store, boosting customer experience and sales. ](https://whaly.io/</use-cases/perfect-store-rollout>)
[Request a demo](https://whaly.io/</form/contact-sales>)
![03](https://whaly.io/icons/03.svg)
Our approach to growth 
We believe in the power of both machines and humans. Leverage our blended approach in which our AI platform does the heavy lifting, and a team of data experts are at your service to implement your solution and guide you along the way.
[![/icons/integrations.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/integrations.svg)Data CollectionConnect to all the data sources within your entire ecosystem, enabling you to access and analyze all your data seamlessly.](https://whaly.io/</platform/data-collection>)
[![/icons/app-builder.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/app-builder.svg)App BuilderWhen you want to go beyond dashboards, create custom apps for your most complex processes and use cases, like checking form compliance or re-ordering stocks.](https://whaly.io/</platform/app-builder>)
[![/icons/data-analyst.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/data-analyst.svg)Self Service Business IntelligenceOur powerful modeling layer is highly in sync with our user-friendly self-service layer, making data exploration accessible to everyone, even non-technical teams.](https://whaly.io/</platform/self-service-bi>)
[![/icons/visualizations.svg](https://whaly.io/icons/visualizations.svg)Copilot BuilderBuild your own AI co-pilot that summarizes your next-best actions and delivers recommended next steps via concise digests and alerts.](https://whaly.io/</platform/copilot-builder>)
[Request a demo](https://whaly.io/</form/contact-sales>)
## How we help our customers
[![Not So Dark](https://whaly.io/stories/logo-nsd.png)](https://whaly.io/</customers/not-so-dark>)
[Whaly helps us drive data adoption and become a more data-driven company. I get to have ownership over the data, while empowering business teams to self-serve the analytics they need....view case study ‚Üí](https://whaly.io/</customers/not-so-dark>)
[![Beanstock](https://whaly.io/stories/beanstock.png)](https://whaly.io/</customers/beanstock>)
[Whaly allows us to conveniently give data visibility to the rest of the business, ensuring that everyone is aligned to business KPIs and objectives....view case study ‚Üí](https://whaly.io/</customers/beanstock>)
[![Zefir](https://whaly.io/stories/zefir.png)](https://whaly.io/</customers/zefir>)
[Give Whaly just 5 minutes, and you‚Äôd already be surprised how much value you can get out of it....view case study ‚Üí](https://whaly.io/</customers/zefir>)
[![Lokki](https://whaly.io/stories/lokki.svg)](https://whaly.io/</customers/lokki>)
[Whaly saved us tons of hours and helped us make faster decisions, all without a data team...view case study ‚Üí](https://whaly.io/</customers/lokki>)
[![Ignition Program](https://whaly.io/stories/ignition-program.png)](https://whaly.io/</customers/ignition-program>)
[Whaly helps us make data-driven decisions and engage every business teams towards this strategy. In only one year, we managed to become data-oriented with a single FTE in the data team...view case study ‚Üí](https://whaly.io/</customers/ignition-program>)
![Benoit Prigent](https://whaly.io/testimonials/benoit.png)
Benoit Prigent
Co Founder / CPO @ Lokki
Whaly helped us create metrics on top of 6 data sources in a matter of days instead of months without technical knowledge required !!
![Edouard Mascr√©](https://whaly.io/testimonials/edouard.png)
Edouard Mascr√©
Co Founder @ Pennylane
We leveraged Whaly on the Sales team to build and share dashboards with ton of partners without having to continuously update things on many spreadsheets. It also gives us deeper insights on sales activity. The dashboards built can be shared with everyone in the company. Whaly saves us hours of data wrangling every day.
![Benjamin Cambier](https://whaly.io/testimonials/benjamin.png)
Benjamin Cambier
Co Founder @ Mansa
Mansa grew really fast in the past months and we were in urge of more precise metrics, especially for acquisition and deals analysis. Our engineering team was already swamped so we started our data analysis with Whaly. We compute our CAC per acquisition channel and understood at what stage the pipeline is under performing in minutes.
![Quentin Lebret](https://whaly.io/testimonials/quentin.png)
Quentin Lebret
VP Operations @ Klox
Whaly gave us the tools to understand how our users consume our product and helped us create a better experience for our users.
![Julio Cesar Rodriguez](https://whaly.io/testimonials/julio.png)
Julio Cesar Rodriguez
Operation Automation Specialist @ Career Karma
Whaly helped us create actionable experience for our SDR based on data our data team has prepped for us in dbt.
![Hugo Cornu](https://whaly.io/testimonials/hugo.png)
Hugo Cornu
Head of Growth @ Klox
Whaly helped us transform the way we work with data. We now back all our decision with data and can make informed decisions at any time

Stay in touch with monthly updates and news from Whaly. No spam, we promise.

generated_description:
## Company Overview: Whaly

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Paris, France  
**Team Size:** 3 employees  
**YC Batch:** S21  
**Website:** [whaly.io](https://whaly.io)  

### Mission
Whaly aims to build a self-service analytics platform that empowers both data and business teams. Initially, their focus was on reducing the burden on data teams by minimizing maintenance and analysis time, thus increasing autonomy for business users. This approach allows organizations to make data-driven decisions more effectively.

### Problem Addressed
In many organizations, data teams act as bottlenecks, hindering swift decision-making across departments. Whaly tackles this challenge by promoting collaboration between data and business teams. The founders, Emilien, Florian, and Pierre, bring extensive experience from creating data advertising platforms for prominent companies in France, which gives them a unique advantage in executing data projects successfully.

### Core Offerings
Whaly provides a platform that aggregates data and delivers real-time insights, helping businesses to:

- Improve decision-making with actionable insights.
- Enhance operational efficiencies using AI-based solutions.
- Enable business users to autonomously engage with data rather than depending on data teams.

Their features include:

1. **Sales Performance Monitoring**: Track sales metrics in real-time.
2. **Retail Execution Monitoring**: Optimize field sales operations.
3. **Custom Application Building**: Develop apps tailored for specific business processes.
4. **Self-Service Business Intelligence**: Facilitate data exploration for non-technical users.

### Customer Impact
Whaly has gained traction with several clients, helping them transition to a more data-centric approach. Companies trust Whaly for its effectiveness in driving data adoption, increasing visibility, and facilitating swift, informed decision-making across their operations.

### Testimonials and Success Stories
Customers have praised Whaly for saving time, enhancing data visibility, and transforming their data engagement process. One customer noted that Whaly reduced their data preparation time from months to days. Another highlighted the ability to generate metrics quickly without extensive technical knowledge.

### Future Vision
Whaly is determined to combine human expertise with AI-powered solutions, envisioning a future where businesses can operate without traditional data silos, enabling more strategic decision-making across all levels of the organization.

Overall, Whaly is making strides in democratizing data access and usage, ultimately driving growth and efficiency in an increasingly data-driven world.
